chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
m: nat
l: nat
r: pos_map l m
s: pos_map m n

Goal:
pm_ext_eq (pm_lift (pm_comp r s)) (pm_comp (pm_lift r) (pm_lift s))

Premises:
pm_comp : forall l m n : nat, pos_map l m -> pos_map m n -> pos_map l n
pm_lift : forall m n : nat, pos_map m n -> pos_map (S m) (S n)
pm_ext_eq : forall m n : nat, pos_map m n -> pos_map m n -> Prop
pos_map = fun m n : nat => pos m -> pos n : nat -> nat -> Set Arguments pos_map (_ _)%nat_scope
pm_lift_ext : forall (m n : nat) (r1 r2 : pos_map m n), pm_ext_eq r1 r2 -> pm_ext_eq (pm_lift r1) (pm_lift r2)
VectorDef.fold_left2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C -> ?A) -> ?A -> forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?B n0 -> VectorDef.t ?C n0 -> ?A where ?A : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- Type] ?B : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- Type] ?C : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- Type]
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- nat] ?n : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- nat]
VectorDef.nth_order : VectorDef.t ?A ?n -> forall p : nat, p < ?n -> ?A where ?A : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- Type] ?n : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- nat]
VectorEq.cast : VectorDef.t ?A ?m -> forall n0 : nat, ?m = n0 -> VectorDef.t ?A n0 where ?A : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- Type] ?m : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- nat]
VectorDef.take : forall p : nat, p <= ?n -> VectorDef.t ?A ?n -> VectorDef.t ?A p where ?A : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- Type] ?n : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- nat]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.cons ?A (VectorDef.hd v) ?n (VectorDef.tl v) where ?A : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- Type] ?n : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- nat]
VectorDef.trunc : forall p : nat, ?n > p -> VectorDef.t ?A ?n -> VectorDef.t ?A (?n - p) where ?A : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- Type] ?n : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- nat]
VectorDef.caseS' : forall (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n)) (P : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n) -> Type), (forall (h : ?A) (t : VectorDef.t ?A ?n), P (VectorDef.cons ?A h ?n t)) -> P v where ?A : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- Type] ?n : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- nat]
Fin.L_R : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- nat]
VectorDef.Exists2_cons_hd : forall (P : ?A -> ?B -> Prop) (m0 : nat) (x1 : ?A) (x2 : ?B) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A m0) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B m0), P x1 x2 -> VectorDef.Exists2 P (VectorDef.cons ?A x1 m0 v1) (VectorDef.cons ?B x2 m0 v2) where ?A : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- Type] ?B : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- Type]
VectorDef.splitat : forall l0 r0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (l0 + r0) -> VectorDef.t ?A l0 * VectorDef.t ?A r0 where ?A : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- Type]
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- nat]
VectorDef.case0 : forall P : VectorDef.t ?A 0 -> Type, P (VectorDef.nil ?A) -> forall v : VectorDef.t ?A 0, P v where ?A : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- Type]
Fin.caseS' : forall (p : pos (S ?n)) (P : pos (S ?n) -> Type), P pos0 -> (forall p0 : pos ?n, P (pos_nxt p0)) -> P p where ?n : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- nat]
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 -> VectorDef.t ?B n0 -> Type, P 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A) (VectorDef.nil ?B) ->...-> forall (n0 : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n0), P n0 v1 v2 where ?A : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- Type] ?B : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- Type]
nat_rect_succ_r : forall (f : ?A -> ?A) (x : ?A) (n0 : nat), nat_rect (fun _ : nat => ?A) x (fun _ : nat => f) (S n0) = nat_rect (fun _ : nat => ?A) (f x) (fun _ : nat => f) n0 where ?A : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- Type]
VectorDef.caseS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall (h : ?A) (n0 : nat) (t : VectorDef.t ?A n0), P n0 (VectorDef.cons ?A h n0 t)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- Type]
pm_lift_fst : forall (m n : nat) (r : pos_map m n), pm_lift r pos0 = pos0
pm_lift_nxt : forall (m n : nat) (r : pos_map m n) (p : pos m), pm_lift r (pos_nxt p) = pos_nxt (r p)
VectorDef.rectS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall a : ?A, P 0 (VectorDef.cons ?A a 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A))) -> (forall (a : ?A) (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n0)), P n0 v -> P (S n0) (VectorDef.cons ?A a (S n0) v)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [l : nat m : nat n : nat r : pos_map l m s : pos_map m n |- Type]
Nat.sqrt_iter_spec : forall k p q r : nat, q = p + p -> r <= q -> let s := Nat.sqrt_iter k p q r in s * s <= k + p * p + (q - r) < S s * S s
in_int = fun p q r : nat => p <= r < q : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments in_int (_ _ _)%nat_scope
Init.Nat.sub = fix sub (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => n | S k => match m with | 0 => n | S l => sub k l end end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.sub (_ _)%nat_scope
exists_between_ind : forall (Q : nat -> Prop) (k : nat) (P : nat -> Prop), (forall l : nat, exists_between Q k l -> P l -> P (S l)) -> (forall l : nat, k <= l -> Q l -> P (S l)) -> forall n : nat, exists_between Q k n -> P n
bet_S : forall (P : nat -> Prop) (k l : nat), between P k l -> P l -> between P k (S l)
between_ind : forall (P : nat -> Prop) (k : nat) (P0 : nat -> Prop), P0 k -> (forall l : nat, between P k l -> P0 l -> P l -> P0 (S l)) -> forall n : nat, between P k n -> P0 n
Inductive exists_between (Q : nat -> Prop) (k : nat) : nat -> Prop := exists_S : forall l : nat, exists_between Q k l -> exists_between Q k (S l) | exists_le : forall l : nat, k <= l -> Q l -> exists_between Q k (S l) Arguments exists_between _%function_scope (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments exists_S _%function_scope (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments exists_le _%function_scope (_ _)%nat_scope
in_int_intro : forall p q r : nat, p <= r -> r < q -> in_int p q r
in_int_S : forall p q r : nat, in_int p q r -> in_int p (S q) r
